name: Normal Pong (jakeyouh)
description:
It's "Normal Pong" !
it's regular. it's normal. there's absolutely nothing weird going on.

this is the first game published on jakeyouh.itch.io that was made with the godot game engine!!!!!!!!! i was working on a different project, but i ran into a tiny problem that felt like a brick wall and i got overwhelmed and quit. i decided that in order for tiny problems to feel like tiny problems, i should probably focus on getting more familiar with godot before tackling a Large dream project! Normal Pong is the first step on the familiarity pathway. i followed a youtube tutorial and then want off in my own zany direction :- )
